intro: Isotrema gongchengense, commonly known as the Gongcheng isotrema, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae and is characterized by its small, clustered flowers and simple leaves. The plant typically grows in shaded, moist environments, often in forest understories. Its botanical features include small, white to pale yellow flowers with four petals and elliptical leaves. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a species of conservation concern.
